<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<jobs>
    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Senior Marketing Strategist]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[Hi there.
  
We are Three Five Two, a people-obsessed growth company that believes it's our responsibility and honor to create an inclusive environment that helps our teams do the best work of their lives. We enable organizations to reach their full potential by putting people first and creating change that matters. How, you ask? 
  

  
We do this by helping our clients find and engage customers and markets, build and scale digital products, and pioneer new ventures that will transform their organizations. To solve these challenges, our teams are composed of business strategists, researchers, marketers, technologists, data scientists and designers.
  

  
We’re not afraid to embrace change in pursuit of the right work. 
  

  
Are we looking for you?
  

  
We’re looking for a Senior Marketing Strategist who will collaboratively lead client engagements, working directly with clients and contributors while setting go-to-market and scalable growth strategies. We need an A-player who is equally capable of setting the roadmap and making recommendations for tactical implementation. Must be agile, committed to experimentation, and skilled at turning data into decisions.
  

  

  
As a human-centered organization, we believe a diversity of experience is critical to connecting with all potential audiences. Particularly for this role, we need someone with deep experience in one of two areas: marketing to BIPOC audiences or Account-Based Marketing. 
  

  

  
Our best performers have strong foundational knowledge and abilities across analytics, SEO, SEM, content, social and email, and deep expertise in at least one of those areas. Experience with digital product go-to-market launch strategies, as well as optimization (conversion rate optimization, information architecture, content mapping, etc.) is a plus.
  

  
Responsibilities
  

  
 
  
+ Guide growth strategy for multiple accounts
  
 
  
+ Build and maintain rapport with clients
  
 
  
+ Deliver expertise across multiple marketing channels
  
 
  
+ Maintain open, clear, and consistent communication with clients and internal team
  
 
  
+ Lead meetings and strategic learning sessions
  
 
  
+ Coordinate tasks with subject matter experts 
  
 
  
+ Manage projects to ensure high-quality outputs
  
 
  
+ Interpret data and convey actionable insights to client and internal team
  
 
  
+ Manage client budgets and identify opportunities to grow relationships
  
 
  

  
Requirements
  

  
Qualifications
  

  
 
  
+ 7+ years of digital marketing experience
  
 
  
+ Deep experience marketing to BIPOC audiences or with Account-Based Marketing
  
 
  
+ Proven ability to build, maintain and grow client relationships
  
 
  
+ Exceptional understanding of digital strategy
  
 
  
+ High emotional IQ
  
 
  
+ Respected by peers
  
 
  
+ Ability to work seamlessly across multiple client accounts
  
 
  
+ Adept at building consensus across groups – internal and external
  
 
  
+ Self-motivated, highly flexible, and takes initiative
  
 
  
+ Experience managing multiple agency and client relationships
  
 
  
+ Commitment to excellence with a positive and resilient attitude
  
 
  
+ Effective communication skills at all levels (both written and verbally)
  
 
  
+ Constant awareness of timelines, due dates, and the bigger picture
  
 
  
+ Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail
  
 
  
+ Ability to work cross-functionally
  
 
  

  
Benefits
  

  
Benefits // what you’ll get
  

  
 
  
+ Freedom: We trust you to do your thing and do it well
  
 
  
+ Professional Development: We set aside a training budget because we want to invest in you
  
 
  
+ Benefits: Health and dental insurance, employer-match 401K retirement program, PTO policy and more
  
 
  

  

  

  
Our values (we live by these)
  

  
 
  
+ Inspiration: We’re fascinated by the industry and what we can do with it.
  
 
  
+ Teamwork: The best results come from collaboration.
  
 
  
+ Embrace Change: Failing fast allows us to learn and iterate quickly. 
  
 
  
+ Candor: True teams do their best work when they respectfully challenge each other. 
  
 
  
+ Grit: We do things the right way, not necessarily the easy way.
  
 
  
+ Celebration: We celebrate your wins, whether it’s exceeding a client’s KPI or winning H-O-R-S-E.
  
 
  

  

  

  

  
A few more important things we as a company support, understand & value:
  

  
 
  
+ Black lives matter
  
 
  
+ Great ideas and talent can come from anywhere
  
 
  
+ Non-traditional paths are OK
  
 
  
+ So are traditional ones
  
 
  

  
We welcome people from all backgrounds who seek the opportunity to help build a future where everyone and everything can move independently. If you have curiosity, passion, and collaborative spirit, work with us, and let’s move the world forward, together.
  

  
Three Five Two is an Equal Opportunity Employer and Prohibits Discrimination and Harassment of Any Kind: Three Five Two is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. All employment decisions at Three Five Two are based on business needs, job requirements and individual qualifications, without regard to race, color, religion or belief, national, social or ethnic origin, sex (including pregnancy), age, physical, mental or sensory disability, HIV Status, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, marital, civil union or domestic partnership status, past or present military service, family medical history or genetic information, family or parental status, or any other status protected by the laws or regulations in the locations where we operate. Three Five Two will not tolerate discrimination or harassment based on any of these characteristics. Three Five Two encourages applicants of all ages. Three Five Two will provide reasonable accommodation to employees who have protected disabilities consistent with local law.
